parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.16</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>serverExec</name>=<value> server</value></part><part><name> </name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Curator </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets coef for some action (coef have to be bigger than -1 000 000, anything lower is considered as disabled action). </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> curatorObj '''setCuratorCoef''' [action,coef] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> curatorObj: [[Object]] - Curator module.  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>  

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [action,coef]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> action: [[String]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> coef: [[Number]] or [[Boolean]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>curatorModule setCuratorCoef ["Place", 1]</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>curatorModule setCuratorCoef ["Delete", -1e10]</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value> 

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[Curator]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name> mp</name>=<value> Can be executed only on server </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part></template>
